author: scottbw
msg: added some more digits to the "invalid widget id" test case, as with more W3C conf tests we can now end up with more than 99 widgets installed when running tests!

author: scottbw
msg: Implemented support for two additional widget properties specified in W3C: AuthorEmail and AuthorHref, and updated conformance tests to latest version at http://samaxes.svn.beanstalkapp.com/widgets_compatibility_matrix/trunk/index.html

msg: NUTCH-741 Job file includes multiple copies of nutch config files.
